subject: Re: [perl #43368] [PATCH] typo in docs/gettingstarted.pod
body:
On Monday 25 June 2007 13:59:53 Bob Wilkinson wrote:

> bob@spain:~/src/parrot/docs$ diff -u gettingstarted.pod.orig
> gettingstarted.pod --- gettingstarted.pod.orig     2007-06-25
> 21:45:46.000000000 +0000 +++ gettingstarted.pod  2007-06-25
> 21:45:57.000000000 +0000
> @@ -292,7 +292,7 @@
>
>  Remove link to old wiki page (dead since 2004.)
>
> -Add irc.perl.ong IRC server.
> +Add irc.perl.org IRC server.
>
>  =item Revision 0.1 - 27 July 2002

Thanks, applied as r19328!

-- c
